context_meta.author: DeltaBravo
context_meta.title: Klay Thompson's All-NBA Snub Is Bad News for Him, but Good News for Dubs
context_meta.summary: The "Splash Brother" finished well behind his backcourt mate, Stephen Curry, placing 26th in the overall voting (tied with Oklahoma City Thunder center Steven Adams and Utah Jazz rookie guard Donovan Mitchell, with all earning two third-place votes apiece). Curry earned an All-NBA Third Team slot. Beyond the loss of bragging rights, the snub has significant financial implications for Thompson, who won't qualify for a "supermax" contract extension. That's assuming the 28-year-old guard doesn't win NBA Most Valuable Player or Defensive Player of the Year before he hits free agency in 2019. context_meta.title: Jaylen Brown immediately apologized after J.J. Redick disapproved of his trash talk
context_meta.summary: Both the Celtics and Sixers have some of the game's best talkers, but that doesn't mean J.J. Redick partakes in any of it. The Sixers guard joined the The Bill Simmons Podcast this week and detailed an in-game interaction he had with the Celtics' Jaylen Brown. At some point during their game in London, Brown threw an expletive in Redick's direction. Redick's response managed to draw an apology from Brown. Redick said: “When we played them in London, Jaylen was guarding me for that game. And at one point in the second half — I'm gonna cuss on your show, I'm sorry — but he called me a (expletive). context_meta.title: The uplifting story of how baseball saved Alex Postma and the infuriating story of how it sent him crashing again
context_meta.summary: This should be an uplifting story about the gift of baseball, the power of acceptance, the way a team and community rallied around a boy. It's also a story of small-town infighting, of a dubious investigation and a governing body struggling to reconcile the letter of the law with its spirit.

context_meta.title: Pete Dunne lays down the gauntlet for Brock Lesnar
context_meta.summary: Pete Dunne is the best. Will Dunne ever get an one on one match with Brock Lesnar with the WWE Universal title on the line? Probably not but thanks to a single tweet from the WWE United Kingdom champion we now want to see that match more than ever. Dunne's run as UK title holder passed over a year this week and The Bruiserweight used it has an opportunity to call out Lesnar. The 24-year-old only trails The Beast Incarnate as the longest reigning current WWE title holder. Who's ready for a Bruiser versus Beast match? context_meta.title: Study: MLB's balls are not juiced but aerodynamically different
context_meta.summary: Using a combination of Statcast data and laboratory testing, the group found that balls in 2016 and 2017 had lower drag coefficients than their predecessors. What they didn’t find was why.

context_meta.author: ipostwhaticareabout
context_meta.title: 'It's about time': Trump pardons late boxer Jack Johnson
context_meta.summary: President Donald Trump on Thursday granted a rare posthumous pardon to boxing's first black heavyweight champion, clearing Jack Johnson's name more than 100 years after what many see as his racially-charged conviction. ''I am taking this very righteous step, I believe, to correct a wrong that occurred in our history and to honor a truly legendary boxing champion,'' Trump said during an Oval Office ceremony.
